info.name: Travel Buddy API Collection

request.description: Register a new user. Password must be at least 8 characters, contain 1 uppercase, 1 special character, and 1 number.
Login user. Returns accessToken and refreshToken in cookies (httpOnly).
Refresh access token using refreshToken cookie. The refreshToken should be present in cookies (set automatically after login). Make sure to enable cookie handling in Postman settings.
Get current authenticated user profile. Requires authentication. Access token should be present in cookies.
Get current authenticated user's profile information. Requires authentication (accessToken in cookies).

body.raw:
{
  "fullName": "New Name",
  "bio": "A short bio about yourself.",
  "location": "Dhaka, Bangladesh",
  "interests": ["Travel", "Hiking"],
  "visitedCountries": ["BD", "IN"]
}

request.description: Update profile information. All fields are optional. Requires authentication.
Update profile photo (attach a file to the 'photo' field in form-data body). Requires authentication.

query.description: Sort order: asc or desc (optional, default: asc)

request.description: Get all travel plans for the authenticated user (membership/ownership). Supports pagination, search, and filtering. Query params: searchTerm, travelType, visibility, isFeatured, page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder. Requires authentication.
Get all reviews written by or received by the authenticated user. Accepts pagination and filtering via query params. Requires authentication.
Get all users (admin only). Accepts pagination and filtering via query params. Requires ADMIN role.
Update status (ACTIVE, SUSPENDED, DELETED) of a user. ADMIN only.
Set verification status of a user (isVerified true/false). ADMIN only.
Update role of a user (USER or ADMIN). ADMIN only.
Soft delete a user (admin only).

formdata.description: Upload up to 10 images. First image becomes cover photo, rest are gallery.

request.description: Create a new travel plan with multipart/form-data. Supports file uploads: up to 10 images (first = coverPhoto, rest = gallery). Required fields: title, destination, startDate, endDate, travelType, visibility. Optional: origin, budgetMin, budgetMax, description, files[]. startDate must be future date. endDate must be >= startDate. Supported image formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, SVG, BMP, TIFF, HEIC, HEIF, ICO. Max 5MB per image. Requires authentication.

query.description: Filter by featured status: true or false (optional)

request.description: Get all PUBLIC travel plans. No authentication required. Returns only plans with visibility: PUBLIC. Supports pagination, filtering, search, and sorting.
Get all travel plans created by the authenticated user (supports pagination, filtering, search, sort). Requires authentication.
Get details for a single travel plan. PUBLIC plans: No authentication required. PRIVATE/UNLISTED plans: Authentication required (must be a plan member). Replace {{planId}} with actual id.

formdata.description: Upload up to 10 images. First image replaces cover photo, rest added to gallery.

request.description: Update a travel plan with multipart/form-data. Only allowed for plan owner or admins. All fields optional, only send what you want to update. Supports file uploads: up to 10 images (first replaces coverPhoto, rest added to gallery). If updating startDate, must be future date. endDate must be >= startDate. Supported image formats: JPEG, PNG, WebP, GIF, SVG, BMP, TIFF, HEIC, HEIF, ICO. Max 5MB per image. Note: Use formdata for file uploads or JSON for text-only updates. Requires authentication.
Delete a travel plan. Only owners or admins can delete. Replace {{planId}} with the actual id.

Add a user to a travel plan by email. role must be one of: OWNER, ADMIN, EDITOR, or VIEWER (typically VIEWER or EDITOR for regular members). OWNER role is automatically assigned when creating a plan and cannot be assigned. Requires authentication and plan management permission.
Get all members of a specific travel plan. Requires authentication. Replace {{planId}} with actual travel plan ID.
Update a member's role in a trip (e.g. from VIEWER to ADMIN). Requires manager/admin rights on the travel plan. userId is the user's UUID.
Remove user from trip by tripMemberId (not userId). Managers/admins only.

Create an itinerary item (activity) for a travel plan. Required: planId, dayIndex (number, >= 1), title (3-200 chars). Optional: description (max 2000 chars), startAt (ISO datetime), endAt (ISO datetime, must be >= startAt), locationId (UUID), order (number, >= 0). Requires authentication and plan member/admin permission.

Get all itinerary items for a specific plan. planId must be in URL path (not query param). Optional query params: dayIndex (filter by day), page, limit. This endpoint can be accessed without authentication for PUBLIC plans. Requires authentication for PRIVATE/UNLISTED plans.
Get a specific itinerary item by ID. itemId must be in URL path. This endpoint can be accessed without authentication for PUBLIC plans. Requires authentication for PRIVATE/UNLISTED plans.

Update fields for an existing itinerary item. All fields optional: dayIndex (number, >= 1), title (3-200 chars), description (max 2000 chars), startAt (ISO datetime), endAt (ISO datetime, must be >= startAt), locationId (UUID), order (number, >= 0). Only send fields you want to update. itemId must be in URL path. Requires authentication and plan member/admin permission.
Delete an itinerary item by ID. Members/admins only.

body.raw:
{
  "planId": "{{planId}}",
  "replace": false,
  "items": [
    {
      "dayIndex": 1,
      "title": "Check-in at Hotel",
      "description": "Arrival and room allocation.",
      "startAt": "2025-09-15T12:00:00.000Z",
      "endAt": "2025-09-15T13:00:00.000Z",
      "locationId": "{{locationId}}",
      "order": 1,
      "id": "{{itemId}}"
    },
    {
      "dayIndex": 2,
      "title": "Beach Visit",
      "description": "Evening at beach",
      "startAt": "2025-09-16T17:00:00.000Z",
      "endAt": "2025-09-16T19:00:00.000Z",
      "order": 1
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Bulk create or update multiple itinerary items. Required: planId, items (array with at least 1 item). Optional: replace (boolean, default: false - if true, replaces all existing items). Each item in items array: dayIndex (required), title (required, 3-200 chars), description (optional, max 2000 chars), startAt (optional, ISO datetime), endAt (optional, ISO datetime), locationId (optional UUID), order (optional, >= 0), id (optional UUID - if provided, updates existing item). Requires authentication and plan member/admin permission.

Reorder itinerary items for a plan. Required: planId, updates (array with at least 1 item). Each item in updates array must have: id (item ID, required), dayIndex (number, >= 1, required), order (number, >= 0, required). Updates the order and/or dayIndex for multiple items at once. Requires authentication and plan member/admin permission.
Create a new AI planning session. Returns session object with id, initial question, and remaining AI uses. Optional: link to existing plan via planId in body. Requires authentication.

Add a step (Q&A) to the planning session. Returns next question and UI step. uiStep must be one of: destination, groupSize, budget, tripDuration, interests, specialRequirements, Final. Requires authentication.

Complete the planning session and create TravelPlan + ItineraryItems. sessionId must be in URL path. finalOutput must include title, destination, startDate, endDate, travelType, and itinerary array. travelType: SOLO, COUPLE, FAMILY, FRIENDS, GROUP. Requires authentication.
Get single planning session by ID. Returns session with promptFlow (Q&A history), finalOutput, and uiState. Requires authentication.

Get all planning sessions for authenticated user with pagination. Query params: page (optional), limit (optional), sortBy (optional), sortOrder (optional, asc/desc). Returns sessions list with meta (pagination info). Requires authentication.
Create a new chat thread for a plan. type must be "PLAN", refId is the planId, title is optional. Members are added separately via Add Member endpoint. Requires authentication.
Get chat thread details by thread ID. Returns thread with members list. Requires authentication.

query.description: Plan ID to find thread for

request.description: Find chat thread by plan ID using query parameter. Returns thread details if found, 404 if not found. Requires authentication.
Add a new member to a chat thread. threadId must be in URL path. role must be one of: owner, admin, member. Requires authentication.

query.description: ISO datetime string for cursor pagination (optional, use nextCursor from previous response)
Number of messages per page (1-100, default: 30)

request.description: Get messages from a thread using cursor pagination. cursor is optional ISO datetime string (use nextCursor from previous response). limit: 1-100, default 30. Returns items array and nextCursor. Requires authentication.

Send a message to a chat thread. threadId must be in URL path. content is required (1-5000 chars). attachments is optional array (max 10 items) with url (required) and type (optional). Requires authentication.
Edit a message. messageId must be in URL path. content is required (1-5000 chars). Can only edit own messages within 15 minutes of sending. Requires authentication.
Soft delete a message. messageId must be in URL path. Can only delete own messages. Requires authentication.

Get all notifications for authenticated user with pagination and filters. Query params: page, limit, sortBy (default: createdAt), sortOrder (asc/desc), type (NotificationType enum), isRead (true/false), searchTerm (searches title and message). Requires authentication.
Mark a single notification as read. notificationId must be in URL path. Requires authentication.
Mark all notifications as read for authenticated user. No body or params needed. Requires authentication.
Get count of unread notifications for authenticated user. Returns { count: number }. Requires authentication.

Create a new meetup for a travel plan. planId and scheduledAt (ISO datetime, must be future) are required. Optional: location (max 500 chars), locationId (UUID), maxParticipants (positive integer), videoRoomLink (valid URL). Note: location and locationId are mutually exclusive - provide only one. Error will be shown if travel plan has ended (endDate < today). Requires authentication.

item.name: Get All Meetups For a Plan

request.description: Get all meetups with pagination and filters. Query params: page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder, searchTerm (searches location), status (PENDING/CONFIRMED/COMPLETED/CANCELLED), planId, organizerId. Requires authentication.
Get single meetup by ID. Returns meetup with plan, organizer, and RSVPs. Requires authentication.

Update meetup details. All fields optional: scheduledAt (must be future date), location (max 500 chars), locationId (UUID), maxParticipants (positive integer), videoRoomLink (valid URL). location and locationId are mutually exclusive. Requires authentication (organizer/admin only).
RSVP to a meetup. status must be ACCEPTED or DECLINED. meetupId must be in URL path. Requires authentication.
Update status of a meetup. status must be one of: PENDING, CONFIRMED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED. meetupId must be in URL path. Requires authentication (organizer/admin only).
Remove a meetup by ID. Admin/host only.

Create a new expense for a plan. Required: planId, payerId, amount, category, expenseDate, splitType. Optional: currency, description (max 1000 chars), locationId, participants. splitType: EQUAL (participants optional, split equally), CUSTOM (participants required with amount field, sum must equal total), PERCENTAGE (participants required with percentage field, sum must equal 100). participants is array of objects with userId and optional amount/percentage. Requires authentication.

query.description: FOOD, TRANSPORT, ACCOMMODATION, ACTIVITY, SHOPPING, OTHER (optional)

request.description: Get all expenses with pagination and filters. Query params: page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder, searchTerm (searches description), category, planId, payerId, splitType, startDate, endDate. Requires authentication.
Get single expense by ID. Returns expense with payer, plan, participants, location, and summary. Requires authentication.

Update expense details. All fields optional: payerId, amount, currency, category, description (max 1000 chars), expenseDate, locationId. Note: planId and splitType cannot be updated. expenseId must be in URL path. Requires authentication (creator or plan admin only).
Delete an expense by ID. Only allowed by creator or plan admin.
Mark an expense participant as settled (paid). expenseId and participantId (ExpenseParticipant ID, not userId) must be in URL path. No body needed. Requires authentication.

Get expense summary for a plan. Returns total expenses, breakdown by category, breakdown by payer, settlement calculations (who owes whom with net amounts), and budget comparison. planId is required as query param. Requires authentication.
Get user's active subscription status. Returns plan, validity, status, etc.
Create a new paid subscription (planType: MONTHLY or YEARLY). Payment handled via Stripe. Returns Stripe session.
Cancel (end) active subscription.
Get single subscription by ID. subscriptionId must be a valid UUID. Requires authentication.

Update subscription settings. cancelAtPeriodEnd (optional boolean): if true, subscription will cancel at the end of the current billing period. subscriptionId must be a valid UUID. Requires authentication.

query.description: Filter by status: ACTIVE, PAST_DUE, CANCELLED, EXPIRED (optional)
Filter by plan type: MONTHLY or YEARLY (optional)

request.description: Get all subscriptions in the system (admin only). Query params: status (ACTIVE, PAST_DUE, CANCELLED, EXPIRED), planType (MONTHLY, YEARLY), planName, page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder. Returns subscriptions list with pagination meta. Requires ADMIN role.

header.description: Stripe signature header for webhook verification

request.description: Stripe webhook endpoint for subscription events (no authentication required). Requires stripe-signature header for verification. Body is raw JSON from Stripe. Used internally by Stripe to notify about subscription changes.
Get single payment by ID. paymentId must be a valid UUID. Requires authentication.

query.description: Filter by status: SUCCEEDED, PENDING, REFUNDED, FAILED (optional)

request.description: Get authenticated user's payment history with pagination and filters. Query params: status (SUCCEEDED, PENDING, REFUNDED, FAILED), subscriptionId (UUID), currency, startDate, endDate, page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder. Returns payments list with pagination meta. Requires authentication.
Get payment summary statistics for authenticated user. Optional query param: subscriptionId (UUID). Returns summary data. Requires authentication.

query.description: Filter by status: SUCCEEDED, PENDING, REFUNDED, FAILED (optional)

request.description: Get all payment transactions (admin only) with pagination and filters. Query params: status (SUCCEEDED, PENDING, REFUNDED, FAILED), userId (UUID), subscriptionId (UUID), currency, startDate, endDate, page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder. Returns payments list with pagination meta. Requires ADMIN role.
Get payment statistics (admin only). Query params: startDate, endDate, subscriptionId (UUID), currency. Returns aggregated payment statistics. Requires ADMIN role.

formdata.description: File to upload (can upload multiple files, max 10)
Associate with plan (UUID, optional - at least one of planId, meetupId, or itineraryItemId required)

request.description: Upload media files (Cloudinary integration). Supports multiple files (max 10). Form-data fields: files (file, required, can be multiple), planId (UUID, optional), meetupId (UUID, optional), itineraryItemId (UUID, optional), type (photo/video, optional). At least one of planId, meetupId, or itineraryItemId must be provided. Requires authentication.
Get single media by ID. mediaId must be a valid UUID. Returns media details including URL, type, and associated entity. Requires authentication.

query.description: Filter by type: photo or video (optional)
Filter by itinerary item ID (UUID, optional)

request.description: List all media files with pagination and filters. Query params: type (photo, video), ownerId (UUID), planId (UUID), meetupId (UUID), itineraryItemId (UUID), provider, page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder. Returns media list with pagination meta. Requires authentication.
Delete a media file by ID (creator/admin only).

Create a review. Required: rating (1-5 integer), source ("USER_TO_USER" or "USER_TO_TRIP"). Optional: comment (string). If source is "USER_TO_USER", reviewedUserId (UUID) is required. If source is "USER_TO_TRIP", planId (UUID) is required. Requires authentication.
Get review statistics. Optional query params: userId (UUID), planId (UUID). Returns aggregated review statistics. Requires authentication.
Get single review by ID. reviewId must be a valid UUID. Returns review details with reviewer and reviewed entity information. Requires authentication.

query.description: Filter by source: USER_TO_USER or USER_TO_TRIP (optional)
Filter by reviewed user ID (UUID, optional)
Filter by edited status: true or false (optional)

request.description: List all reviews with pagination and filters. Query params: rating (1-5), source (USER_TO_USER, USER_TO_TRIP), reviewerId (UUID), reviewedUserId (UUID), planId (UUID), isEdited (true/false), searchTerm (searches comments), page, limit, sortBy, sortOrder. Returns reviews list with pagination meta. Requires authentication.
Update a review (written by you).
Delete (remove) a review by ID (written by you or admin).

query.description: Sort order: asc or desc (optional, default: asc)

request.description: Get all PUBLIC travel plans. No authentication required. Returns only plans with visibility: PUBLIC. Supports pagination, filtering, search, and sorting.
Get details for a single travel plan. PUBLIC plans: No authentication required. PRIVATE/UNLISTED plans: Authentication required (must be a plan member). Replace {{planId}} with actual id.
Get full itinerary for a plan. PUBLIC plans: No authentication required. PRIVATE/UNLISTED plans: Authentication required (must be a plan member). Returns items grouped by day.

Get user dashboard overview with stats (total plans, upcoming trips, total expenses, active subscription), charts (expenses by category - pie chart, plans timeline - line chart), recent activity, upcoming meetups, and recent notifications. Requires authentication (USER or ADMIN). Note: Admins should use /dashboard/admin/overview endpoint.

Get admin dashboard overview with system-wide stats (total users, active users, total plans, public plans, total revenue, active subscriptions, total meetups, total expenses, pending booking requests), 4 charts (revenue over time - area chart, plans by travel type - bar chart, user growth - line chart, subscription status - pie chart), recent activity, and top performing plans. Requires ADMIN role.

Send a join request to a PUBLIC or UNLISTED travel plan. Users can include an optional message with their request. Returns error if plan is PRIVATE, user is already a member, or user already has a pending request for this plan. Requires authentication.

Get all outgoing join requests made by the authenticated user. Returns requests with status (PENDING, APPROVED, REJECTED) and associated plan details. Ordered by creation date (newest first). Requires authentication.

Get all pending join requests for a specific travel plan. Only accessible by plan owner or admins (users with canManageMembers permission). Returns requests with user details (name, email, profile image, bio, interests). Ordered by creation date (oldest first). Requires authentication.

Approve a join request. User is automatically added as a trip member with VIEWER role and JOINED status. A notification is sent to the requester. Only accessible by plan owner or admins. Requires authentication.
Reject a join request. Request status is updated to REJECTED and a notification is sent to the requester. Only accessible by plan owner or admins. Requires authentication.
Cancel own pending join request. Only the requester can cancel their own request, and only if it is still PENDING. Returns error if request is already approved or rejected. Requires authentication.
